Enum DrawModelEvent.Type

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<DrawModelEvent.Type>
      jdraw.framework.DrawModelEvent.Type
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<DrawModelEvent.Type>
Enclosing class:
DrawModelEvent
public static enum DrawModelEvent.Type
extends Enum<DrawModelEvent.Type>

This enum describes the type of event.

Enum Constant Summary
DRAWING_CHANGED
          This event indicates that more than one figure has changed, i.e.\ that the order of the figures has changed.
DRAWING_CLEARED
          This event indicates that the whole drawing was cleared, i.e.\ all figures were removed at once.
FIGURE_ADDED
          Indicates that a figure was added to the draw model.
FIGURE_CHANGED
          Indicates that a figure was changed in the draw model.
FIGURE_REMOVED
          Indicates that a figure was removed from the draw model.

Enum Constant Detail

FIGURE_ADDED

public static final DrawModelEvent.Type FIGURE_ADDED
Indicates that a figure was added to the draw model.

FIGURE_REMOVED

public static final DrawModelEvent.Type FIGURE_REMOVED
Indicates that a figure was removed from the draw model.

FIGURE_CHANGED

public static final DrawModelEvent.Type FIGURE_CHANGED
Indicates that a figure was changed in the draw model.

DRAWING_CLEARED

public static final DrawModelEvent.Type DRAWING_CLEARED
This event indicates that the whole drawing was cleared, i.e.\ all figures were removed at once.

DRAWING_CHANGED

public static final DrawModelEvent.Type DRAWING_CHANGED
This event indicates that more than one figure has changed, i.e.\ that the order of the figures has changed. The view has to redraw the whole scene.
